src:
Armani dere sve redom po Evroligi! Mesinina kaznena ekspedicija počistila i Baksoniju
Micov jako dobar, Nedović slab

07 Nov 2019

Armani iz Milana je lider Evrolige! Četa Etorea Mesine dere sve redom, a večeras je u Italiji deklasirana Baskonija – 81:74.
Dolazak trenerske legende poput Etorea Mesine na klupu popularnih Manekena se pokazao kao ključni potez koji je ovaj  klub godinama čekao lutajući sa raznim trenerskim promašajima. Oterao je prvu zvezdu tima Majka Džejmsa, sklopio tim po svom ukusu, promenio stil igre i rezultati su vidljivi posle dva meseca. Nakon poraza od Bajerna u prvom kolu Evrolige i nekih slabijih rezultata u prvenstvu, Armani je ušao u strašnu seriju i počeo da pobeđuje sve redom. Krenulo je pobedom nad Žalgirisom u Milanu, nastavile se trijumfima nad Panatinaikosem u Atini, Fenerbahčeom kući, Albom u gostima, Barselonom u Milanu i večerašnjom pobedom nad gostima iz Baskije.
Mesina je utegao odbranu i iz nje su se izrodili bolji napad i rezultati.
Iako je Baskonija došla u dobroj formi i posle prve četvrtine vodila pet poena razlike, Milano je sredinom drugog kvartala uspeo da preokrene i pređe u vođstvo koje do kraja nije ispuštao. Samo ga je postepeno povećavao. Na poluvremenu je bilo šest razlike, u trećoj četvrtini prva dvocifrena prednost (56:46), da bi u poslednjih 10 minuta Manekeni potpuno nokautirali Baskoniju i otišli na nedostižnih 18 poena prednosti. Na kraju su gosti uspeli da ublaže poraz kada je sve već bilo gotovo.
Preokret Armanija u drugoj četvrtini je došao uz sjajnu rolu Vladimira Micova koji je u tom periodu ubacio 11 poena uz samo jedan promašaj iz igre i nijedan sa linije penala. U drugom poluvremenu su se razigrali Serhio Rodrigez, Amedeo Dela Vale i Majkl Rol, odbrana je ostala na nivou i Baskonija je slomljena.
Dela Vale je sa 15 poena bio najefikasniji u Armaniju, Rodrigez je ubacio 13 iako je šutirao 2/5 i za dva i za tri poena. Micov i Rol su ubacili po 12 poena, a srpski košarkaš nije trošio mnogo lopti (2/3 za dva, 2/4 za tri). Nemanja Nedović je za 14 minuta ubacio samo dva poena, za dva poena je šutirao 1/3, a za tri 0/3. Na drugoj strani je najefikasniji bio Nik Stauskas sa 15 poena.

EVROLIGA - 7. KOLO:


Četvrtak

Zenit - Himki 73:87/Holins 25 - Buker 20/
Crvena zvezda - Real Madrid 60:75/Beron 17 - Ljulj 16/
Olimpijakos - Efes 67:86/Pol 15, Milutinov 10 - Micić 27/
Makabi - Alba 104:78/Dibartolomeo 19 - Siva 14/
Olimpija Milano - Baskonija 81:74/Dela Vale 15, Micov 12 - Stauskas 15/

Petak



18.45:  (1,25) Fenerbahče  (17,00)  Bajern (4,40) 

19.00:  (2,55) Žalgiris  (14,50)  Barselona (1,60) 

20.30:  (1,25) Panatinaikos  (17,00)  Valensija (4,40) 

20.45:  (3,90) ASVEL  (16,00) CSKA (1,30) 


NAPOMENA: Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
Armani yells all over the Euroleague! Messina's criminal expedition cleared Baxony as well
Mic's very good, Nedovic weak

07 Nov 2019

Milan Armani is Euroleague leader! The company of Etore Messina screams in succession, and tonight in Basque Country Italy is 81:74.
The arrival of a coaching legend like Etore Messina on the bench of the popular Mannequins has proved to be a key move that this club has been waiting for for years wandering with various coaching failures. He shook off the first star of the Mike James team, assembled the team to his liking, changed the style of play and the results were visible after two months. After losing to Bayern Munich in the first round of the Euroleague and some poor results in the Championship, Armani went into a terrible series and started winning everything in a row. It started with a victory over Zalgiris in Milan, followed by triumphs over Panathinaikos in Athens, Fenerbahce House, Alba away, Barcelona in Milan and tonight's victory over Basque guests.
Messina weighed in on the defense and gave rise to better attack and results.
Although Basque came in good form and managed a five point lead after the first quarter, Milan managed to reverse in the middle of the second quarter and move into a lead that it did not miss until the end. He was only gradually increasing it. There were six differences at halftime, the first two-digit advantage (56:46), and in the last 10 minutes the Mannequins completely knocked out Basque Country and went for an elusive 18 points advantage. In the end, the guests managed to cushion their defeat when it was all over.
Armani's turn in the second quarter came with a brilliant roll by Vladimir Micov, who scored 11 points during the period with just one miss from the game and none from the penalty line. In the second half, Sergio Rodriguez, Amedeo Della Vale and Michael Roll played, the defense remained level and Basque was broken.
Della Vale was the most efficient in Armani with 15 points, Rodriguez shot 13 even though he shot 2/5 both for two and three points. Micov and Rol each scored 12 points each, and the Serbian basketball player did not spend many balls (2/3 for two, 2/4 for three). Nemanja Nedovic scored only two points in 14 minutes, shot 1/3 for two points and 0/3 for three. On the other hand, Nik Stauskas was the most efficient with 15 points.

EUROLEAGUE - ROUND 7


Thursday

Zenit - Khimki 73: 87 / Hollins 25 - Booker 20 /
Red Star Real Madrid 60: 75 / Beron 17 - Feb 16 /
Olympiakos - Ephesus 67: 86 / Pol 15, Milutinov 10 - Micic 27 /
Maccabi - Alba 104: 78 / Dibartolomeo 19 - Gray 14 /
Olympia Milan - Basque Country 81: 74 / Dela Vale 15, Micov 12 - Stauskas 15 /
